        Calls DAO to add relevant entity
        Parameters:
        userDTO - - DTO to be added as entity to database
        password - - password to be added to entity
        confirmPassword - - will check if passwords match
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

        java.util.List<UserDTO> getParticipants​(java.lang.String eventId,
                                        Role role)
                                 throws ServiceException
        Calls DAO to get users that participate in the event
        Parameters:
        eventId - - id as a String to validate and convert to long
        role - - should be either VISITOR or SPEAKER
        Returns:
        List of UserDTOs that match demands
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

      • changePassword

                         throws ServiceException

        Parameters:
        userId - id to find user by
        Returns:
        new password for user, generated by method
